Text: Thanks for your great work with torrents to NBA games! Any chance to upload them earlier?

You're welcome! Yes, it's posible for some of them, but I have also a life to live. First, it's a 6-9 hours difference from USA to Europe, and second, from TPB I ain't take any money, so that time that you don't pay me, take it like a gift. Cheers!

Ive had a problem with this video... couldnt play it on any of my players.... the screen is black and only the audio plays... Ive downloaded other videos from you, but this one doesnt seem to work with me, any thoughts?
Thanks for the uploads.... keep sending lakers games... :D
